title: A January Dandelion - lines 1-4 function primarily

content.question: Lines 1-4 (“All . . . snow”) function primarily to

choices.label: identify the location of the poem
establish the setting and the mood of the poem
provide a characterization of the poem’s speaker
convey the central contradiction of the poem

content.answer: establish the setting and the mood of the poem

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
